Author: Chetelat, 2017
test: t-test on extracted values (already adjusted for brain size)

Author: Hernandez, 2016
test: t-test (adjusted for TIV, age, and gender)

Author: Leung, 2012
test: t-test (adjusted for global brain size during normalization)

Author: Luders, 2015b
test: t-test (gp * age interactions adjusted for sex and TIV)

Author: Pagnoni, 2007
test: t-test (gp * age interaction adjusted for TIV)

Author: Friedel, 2015
test: regression (adjusted for age and total avg thickness)
